ja253:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja253:0.4_0: The group of nine on “without taking”.
ja253:1.1_0: “My food and drink are abundant and sublime,
ja253:1.2_0: And they appear because of this gem.
ja253:1.3_0: They don’t give you this beggar,
ja253:1.4_0: Nor will I return to your hermitage.
ja253:2.1_0: Like a youth holding a clean stone,
ja253:2.2_0: You frighten me, asking for this gem.
ja253:2.3_0: They don’t give you this beggar,
ja253:2.4_0: Nor will I return to your hermitage.”
ja253:3.2_0: They teach and asking for too much.
ja253:3.3_0: When the brahmin asked the dragon for his gem,
ja253:4.1_0: The third group of jeweled earrings
